mapper.select: select * from INSIGHT_XCX_WRZSQX order by date

SELECT M.* FROM (SELECT T.FXSJ AS DATE,ROUND(AVG(T.WRZS),2) AS FVALUE,T.JYS FROM INSIGHT_FXSJ_FXZBZ T LEFT JOIN hub_ref_jysinfo H ON H.JYSINFO=T.JYS WHERE H.JYS IN ('0012','0014','0015') AND T.FXSJ >= (SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MAX(FXSJ),'YYYYMMDD')-INTERVAL'15 DAY','YYYYMMDD') FROM INSIGHT_FXSJ_FXZBZ) AND T.FXSJ <= (SELECT MAX(FXSJ) FROM INSIGHT_FXSJ_FXZBZ) GROUP BY T.JYS,H.JYS,T.FXSJ UNION ALL SELECT T.FXSJ AS DATE,ROUND(AVG(T.WRZS),2) AS FVALUE,'总量交易额趋势' AS JYS FROM INSIGHT_FXSJ_FXZBZ T LEFT JOIN hub_ref_jysinfo H ON H.JYSINFO=T.JYS WHERE H.JYS IN ('0012','0014','0015') AND T.FXSJ >= (SELECT TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(MAX(FXSJ),'YYYYMMDD')-INTERVAL'15 DAY','YYYYMMDD') FROM INSIGHT_FXSJ_FXZBZ) AND T.FXSJ <= (SELECT MAX(FXSJ) FROM INSIGHT_FXSJ_FXZBZ) GROUP BY T.FXSJ) M ORDER BY M.DATE,M.JYS
select hdtj.jys,hdtj.jysmc,hrj.jysinfo from hub_dd_tqs_jys hdtj left join hub_ref_jysinfo hrj on hdtj.jys = hrj.jys where hdtj.jysfl = '2' or hrj.jys in ('0015') order by jys

select t.* from (select hdtj.jys,hdtj.jysmc,hrj.jysinfo,hdtj.jysfl from hub_dd_tqs_jys hdtj left join hub_ref_jysinfo hrj on hdtj.jys = hrj.jys where hdtj.jysfl = '2' or hrj.jys in ('0015') order by jys) t where t.jysfl = #{type}

SELECT HRJ.JYSINFO, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM HUB_FXSJ HF WHERE TO_DATE(HF.BJSJ,'YYYYMMDD') <= CURRENT_DATE AND TO_DATE(HF.BJSJ,'YYYYMMDD') > CURRENT_DATE - CAST(TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE,'D')||' DAY' AS INTERVAL) AND HF.JGDM = HDTJ.JYS AND HF.CLZT IN ('已上报','已查阅','已确认')) BZFXZ, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM HUB_FXSJ HF WHERE TO_DATE(HF.BJSJ,'YYYYMMDD') <= CURRENT_DATE AND TO_DATE(HF.BJSJ,'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE,'YYYYMM')||'01','YYYYMMDD') AND HF.JGDM = HDTJ.JYS AND HF.CLZT IN ('已上报','已查阅','已确认')) BYFXZ, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM HUB_FXSJ HF WHERE TO_DATE(HF.BJSJ,'YYYYMMDD') <= CURRENT_DATE AND TO_DATE(HF.BJSJ,'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE,'YYYY')||'0101','YYYYMMDD') AND HF.JGDM = HDTJ.JYS AND HF.CLZT IN ('已上报','已查阅','已确认')) BNFXZ, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM HUB_FXSJ HF WHERE TO_DATE(HF.BJSJ,'YYYYMMDD') <= CURRENT_DATE AND HF.JGDM = HDTJ.JYS AND HF.CLZT IN ('已上报','已查阅','已确认')) LJFXZ FROM HUB_DD_TQS_JYS HDTJ LEFT JOIN HUB_REF_JYSINFO HRJ ON HDTJ.JYS = HRJ.JYS WHERE HDTJ.JYS IN ('0014','0012','0015') UNION ALL SELECT '总量' JYSINFO, SUM((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM HUB_FXSJ HF WHERE TO_DATE(HF.BJSJ,'YYYYMMDD') <= CURRENT_DATE AND TO_DATE(HF.BJSJ,'YYYYMMDD') > CURRENT_DATE - CAST(TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE,'D')||' DAY' AS INTERVAL) AND HF.JGDM = HDTJ.JYS AND HF.CLZT IN ('已上报','已查阅','已确认'))) BZFXZ, SUM((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM HUB_FXSJ HF WHERE TO_DATE(HF.BJSJ,'YYYYMMDD') <= CURRENT_DATE AND TO_DATE(HF.BJSJ,'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE,'YYYYMM')||'01','YYYYMMDD') AND HF.JGDM = HDTJ.JYS AND HF.CLZT IN ('已上报','已查阅','已确认'))) BYFXZ, SUM((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM HUB_FXSJ HF WHERE TO_DATE(HF.BJSJ,'YYYYMMDD') <= CURRENT_DATE AND TO_DATE(HF.BJSJ,'YYYYMMDD') >= TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE,'YYYY')||'0101','YYYYMMDD') AND HF.JGDM = HDTJ.JYS AND HF.CLZT IN ('已上报','已查阅','已确认'))) BNFXZ, SUM((SELECT COUNT(1) FROM HUB_FXSJ HF WHERE TO_DATE(HF.BJSJ,'YYYYMMDD') <= CURRENT_DATE AND HF.JGDM = HDTJ.JYS AND HF.CLZT IN ('已上报','已查阅','已确认'))) LJFXZ FROM HUB_DD_TQS_JYS HDTJ LEFT JOIN HUB_REF_JYSINFO HRJ ON HDTJ.JYS = HRJ.JYS WHERE HDTJ.JYS IN ('0014','0012','0015');

SELECT H.JYS,T.JYS AS JYSINFO,T.FXSJ,ROUND(AVG(T.WRZS),2) AS WRZS FROM INSIGHT_FXSJ_FXZBZ T LEFT JOIN hub_ref_jysinfo H ON T.JYS=H.JYSINFO WHERE T.FXSJ = (SELECT MAX(FXSJ) FROM INSIGHT_FXSJ_FXZBZ) AND H.JYS IN ('0012','0014','0015') GROUP BY H.JYS,T.JYS,T.FXSJ

WITH FXSL AS (SELECT T.FXLB,COUNT(1) AS FXSL FROM HUB_FXSJ T WHERE T.JYSFL=#{riskType} AND T.JGDM IN ('0012','0014','0015') GROUP BY T.FXLB), FXZSL AS (SELECT COUNT(*) AS FXZSL FROM HUB_FXSJ WHERE JYSFL=#{riskType} AND JGDM IN ('0012','0014','0015')) SELECT A.FXLB,A.FXSL,B.FXZSL,ROUND((A.FXSL::NUMERIC/B.FXZSL)*100,2) AS FXZB FROM FXSL A,FXZSL B
